description.message: Send PDF links directly to your favorite PDF viewer like Adobe Acrobat Reader

options_path.message: Path to a PDF Reader executable

options_link.message: Capture the left-click on the PDF links

options_download.message: Download PDF file first, then open with the PDF reader

options_translate.message: Translate this extension to your language

options_delay.message: Delay in seconds to call the external PDF viewer when download is finished

options_admin.message: This extension supports managed storage, which means that if you are an administrator of a network, you can configure it for all computers in your domain. This can make it easier to manage and control the settings and preferences for the extension across your organization

bg_msg_1.message: Cannot find the downloaded PDF file!

bg_msg_4.message: This doesn't seem to be a PDF address. Click the notification to proceed anyway.

bg_msg_5.message: Cannot detect URL of this page
